clinical_history: Patient presents with cough and fever.
findings: Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of diaphragmatic region.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in diaphragmatic region.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in diaphragmatic region.
Pleural effusion on the diaphragmatic region side, moderate in size.
Enlarged lymph nodes in diaphragmatic region, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
